item.title: We All Have Our Own Hole
item.description: This week on Sunshine and Frank: E3 2015! Bethesda’s Fallout 4 gets annouced, Bungie’s announcement suffers fallout, Dishonoured 2 gets revealed, FFVII gets a remake, we (finally) get a glimpse at what the Division is all about, and more!
